recipe.title: Dirty Vodka Martini
ingredients: 10 tablespoons juice from jar of olives
instructions: Pour 1/4 cup vodka into each of the 10 chilled Martini glasses. Martini glasses. Add 1 olive and 1 tablespoon olive juice to each glass. Serve.
